channel.title: Hello there
channel.description:
Just thought I'd introduce myself, seeing that I'm new to these forums in which I heard about from a friend. I am in no way affiliated with Moparscape, so do think get a first impression of me as some spammer or whatever. I hope to be able to contribute as much to these forums as I possibly can.
Thanks for reading if you did :D.

you do know it’s forbidden to have multiple accounts?
